resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157030</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157030</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2780</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A thank- you note</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Danken Sie beachten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un remerciement vous noter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Agradecer você para anotar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un ringrazi voi notare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευχαριστήστε - σημειώνετε</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un agradecimiento usted observar</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for a writing activity where students write a thank you note for a gift received.. Includes actual examples.Includes an assessment rubric</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Schreiben Aktivität, 
in der Kursteilnehmer danken Sie schreiben zu beachten für ein 
empfangenes Geschenk. Enthält tatsächliches examples.Includes 
eine Einschätzung Rubrik</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité d'écriture 
où les étudiants vous écrivent à un remerciement pour noter d'un 
cadeau reçu. Inclut examples.Includes réel une rubrique 
d'évaluation</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade da 
escrita onde os estudantes o escrevam agradecer para anotar para um 
presente recebido. Inclui examples.Includes real um rubric da 
avaliação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività di 
scrittura dove gli allievi li scrivono ad un ringrazi per notare per 
un regalo ricevuto. Include examples.Includes reale una rubrica 
di valutazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα γραψίματος
όπου οι σπουδαστές γράφουν ότι ευχαριστήστε εσείς σημειώνει για
ένα δώρο λαμβανόμενο .. Περιλαμβάνει τα πραγματικά 
παραδείγματα περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad de la 
escritura donde los estudiantes le escriben a agradecimiento para 
observar por un regalo recibido. Incluye examples.Includes real 
una rúbrica del gravamen</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
